mapper.sql: ID, Code, Name, Amount, EnableAmount, LimitQuantity, TotalQuantity, BeginTime, EndTime, Color, UseFlag, Memo, CreateTime, Creator, ModifyTime, Modifier, UpdatedTime, SuitType, EffectiveTime, ExtID
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'false' as QUERYID,
from m_coupon
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into m_coupon (ID, Code, Name, Amount, EnableAmount, LimitQuantity, TotalQuantity, BeginTime, EndTime, Color, UseFlag, Memo, CreateTime, Creator, ModifyTime, Modifier, UpdatedTime, SuitType, EffectiveTime, ExtID) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{enableamount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{limitquantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{totalquantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{begintime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{color,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{useflag,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifytime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updatedtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{suittype,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{effectivetime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{extid,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into m_coupon
ID,
Code,
Name,
Amount,

LimitQuantity,

Color,
UseFlag,

mapper.update:
update m_coupon
Code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Amount = #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
EnableAmount = #{enableamount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
LimitQuantity = #{limitquantity,jdbcType=INTEGER},
TotalQuantity = #{totalquantity,jdbcType=INTEGER},
BeginTime = #{begintime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
EndTime = #{endtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
Color = #{color,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UseFlag = #{useflag,jdbcType=TINYINT},
Memo = #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CreateTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
Creator = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ModifyTime = #{modifytime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
Modifier = #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UpdatedTime = #{updatedtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
SuitType = #{suittype,jdbcType=TINYINT},
EffectiveTime = #{effectivetime,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ExtID = #{extid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update m_coupon set Code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Amount = #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, EnableAmount = #{enableamount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, LimitQuantity = #{limitquantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, TotalQuantity = #{totalquantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, BeginTime = #{begintime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, EndTime = #{endtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, Color = #{color,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UseFlag = #{useflag,jdbcType=TINYINT}, Memo = #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CreateTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, Creator = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ModifyTime = #{modifytime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, Modifier = #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UpdatedTime = #{updatedtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, SuitType = #{suittype,jdbcType=TINYINT}, EffectiveTime = #{effectivetime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ExtID = #{extid,jdbcType=INTEGER} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
